cards.name: Cutlass
cards.description: Equip a 4 / 2 blackbeard:Weapon.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Intimidating Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Cannonball
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sword of Chaos
cards.description:
Equip a 3 / 3 (4) blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

cards.name: Sword of Fire
cards.description:
Equip a 3 / 3 (4) blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sword of Wisdom
cards.description:
Equip a 3 / 3 (4) blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Vampiric Scepter
cards.description:
Equip a 7 (8) / 3 blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, heal 2 (3) HP.

cards.name: Beat Up
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage twice.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Blind Attacks
cards.description: Deal 3 (4) damage to a random enemy 3 times.

cards.name: Cloak and Cannonball
cards.description:
Gain 5 (7) Block.
Add a Cannonball (+) into your hand.

cards.name: Dagger
cards.description:
Equip a 2 / 3 (4) blackbeard:Weapon.
At the start of your turn,
1 Durability from Dagger is used to deal damage equal to its Attack to a random enemy.

cards.name: Deadly Arsenal
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Draw 1 card for each unique blackbeard:Weapon you have currently equipped.

cards.name: Fencing
cards.description: Give your rightmost blackbeard:Weapon + 4 (5) / + 2 (3).

cards.name: Fiery Defense
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies (twice).

cards.name: Golden Defense
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to
 (3 +) 1.5% of Gold gained
this run.

cards.name: Golden Strike
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to
 (3 +) 1.5% of Gold gained
this run.

cards.name: Pirate's Will
cards.description:
Remove all of your debuffs.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rearming Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Equip a 4 / 2 blackbeard:Weapon.

cards.name: Sharpening
cards.description: Give all your equipped blackbeard:Weapons + 2 (3) Attack.

cards.name: Shrapnel
cards.description: Deal 7 (10) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spear
cards.description: Equip a 7 (10) / 1 blackbeard:Weapon.

cards.name: Sword
cards.description:
Choose 1 of 3 Swords.
Equip a 3 / 3 (4) blackbeard:Weapon with an additional effect.

cards.name: Sword Dance
cards.description: This turn, your next 3 (5) Attacks use all equipped blackbeard:Weapons.

cards.name: Tactical Retreat
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
Draw 1 more card next turn.

cards.name: Toast
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) blackbeard:Resistance.
At the start of your next turn, lose 3 (4) blackbeard:Resistance.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wise Defense
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Agile Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 (13) damage.
If you have equipped a blackbeard:Weapon this turn, reduce cost of this
card to 0.

cards.name: Anchor
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 10 Block.
 (Draw 1 card.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Armor Up
cards.description: Whenever you attack with a blackbeard:Weapon, gain 2 (3) Block.

cards.name: Bandana
cards.description:
Whenever you hit an enemy, gain 5 Gold,
up to a maximum of 25 (30) Gold.

cards.name: Boarding
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies twice.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Brown Pants
cards.description: Gain 5 (6) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Buried Treasure
cards.description:
Gain 20 (25) Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cannon Barrage
cards.description: Add X (+1) Cannonballs into your hand.

cards.name: Cannonball Supply
cards.description:
Add 3 Cannonballs into your hand.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Captain's Cabin
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Add 1 (2) Cannonball (Cannonballs) into your hand.

cards.name: Cat O' Nine Tails
cards.description:
Equip a 4 (6) / 3 blackbeard:Weapon.
After you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, give it +2 Attack.

cards.name: Chaotic Defense
cards.description:
Gain 7 (9) Block.
Add 1 (2) random card (cards) into your hand.

cards.name: Dangerous Blow
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) damage.
At the end of your next turn, you take 3 (2) damage.

cards.name: Delayed Pain
cards.description:
Gain 16 (20) Block.
At the end of your next turn, you take 3 (2) damage.

cards.name: Double Bottom
cards.description:
Gain 10 (13) Block.
Next turn, gain 10 (13) Block.

cards.name: Double Cannonball
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
Add a Cannonball (+) into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eyepatch
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Next turn, gain 1 Weak.
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Fishing Nets
cards.description: Gain 6 (8) blackbeard:Rusty Thorns.

cards.name: Ghost in the Rum
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Lose 2 (1) blackbeard:Resistance.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Cannonball
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to
 (4 +) 2% of Gold gained this run.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Infinite Barrage
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a Cannonball into your hand.

cards.name: Jolly Roger
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) Weak to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pegleg
cards.description:
Lose 2 Dexterity.
Gain 4 (5) Strength.

cards.name: Pirate Earring
cards.description: Gain 1 (2) Artifact.

cards.name: Pirate Hook
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
If this deals at least 10 damage, deal 7 (9) damage again.

cards.name: Powder Keg
cards.description:
Equip a 0 / 1 blackbeard:Weapon.
When it is destroyed, deal 15 (20) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Provisioning
cards.description:
Obtain a random potion.
Next turn, obtain a random potion.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Recklessness
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] ( [E]).
Next turn, lose [E].

cards.name: Remove Scurvy
cards.description:
Heal 5 (8) HP.
Remove all of your debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Revenge
cards.description: Deal 0 - 50 (60) damage to ALL enemies, based on how many % of HP you are missing.

cards.name: Rum
cards.description: Gain 2 blackbeard:Resistance.

cards.name: Scrap
cards.description:
Destroy your rightmost blackbeard:Weapon to gain
[E] [E] ( [E]).

cards.name: Smithing Hammer
cards.description:
Equip a 3 / 4 (5) blackbeard:Weapon.
After you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon and passively at the start of your turn using 1 Durability, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Terror of the Seas
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Upgrade
cards.description: Give all your equipped blackbeard:Weapons + 1 (2) / + 1 (2).

cards.name: Vengeful Spirit
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
The next time your Intangible wears off, you take 10 (8) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Weapon Proficiency
cards.description: Your attacks use an additional blackbeard:Weapon.

cards.name: Boost Morale
cards.description:
Gain 5 Gold.
Draw 1 card.
Gain [E] ( [E]).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bounty Hunter
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) damage.
If Fatal, gain 16 (20) Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Captain's Hat
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Strength.
Gain 2 (3) blackbeard:Resistance.

cards.name: Drunken Sailor
cards.description: Whenever you use a potion, its effect is applied an additional time.

cards.name: Final Barrage
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 4 (6) times the amount of Cannonballs played this combat.
(Every type of Cannonball counts.)

cards.name: Golden Noose
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to
4 (5)% of Gold gained this run.

cards.name: Golden Rain
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to
2.5 (3)% of Gold gained
this run to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Halberd
cards.description:
Equip a 6 (8) / 4 blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, apply 3 blackbeard:Bleed to a target per hit.

cards.name: Humongous Cannonball
cards.description:
Deal 36 (48) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Intoxication
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) blackbeard:Resistance.
At the start of your turn, lose 1 blackbeard:Resistance.

cards.name: Lifeboat
cards.description: Gain 26 (32) Block.

cards.name: Mega Upgrade
cards.description: Give all your equipped blackbeard:Weapons + 3 (5) / + 3 (5).

cards.name: Murder
cards.description:
Deal 500 (1000) damage    
to a non-Boss enemy.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Parrot
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
The last card played each turn is played an additional time.
This power does not stack.

cards.name: Pirate Strength
cards.description: Gain 6 (8) Strength.

cards.name: Power-hungry
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Put 1 Power card from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reaper's Scythe
cards.description:
Equip a 8 (11) / 3 blackbeard:Weapon.
Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, apply 1 blackbeard:Reaper's Mark to a target per hit.

cards.name: Salvager
cards.description: Whenever a blackbeard:Weapon is destroyed, gain [E] ( [E]).

cards.name: Undead Form
cards.description:
Gain 3 Intangible.
The next time your Intangible wears off, you take 30 (24) damage.

cards.name: Weapon Mastery
cards.description: Whenever you equip a blackbeard:Weapon, draw 1 (2) card (cards).

relics.name: Load the Cannons
relics.description: At the start of each combat, and then every 4 turns, add a Cannonball into your hand.

relics.name: Cannonballs of Steel
relics.description: Your Cannonballs deal 2 more damage. (Works with every type of Cannonball.)

relics.name: Hip Flask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 blackbeard:Resistance.

relics.name: Spearhead
relics.description: When a blackbeard:Weapon has 1 Durability, it deals 3 more damage.
relics.flavorText: The durability of your Weapon ends... and so does the life of your enemy.

relics.name: Treasure Chest
relics.flavorText: This treasure chest contains untold riches.

relics.name: White Pearl
relics.description: Whenever you equip a blackbeard:Weapon, give it +1 Attack.

relics.name: Barbed Cannonballs
relics.description: Whenever a Cannonball deals unblocked damage, apply 1 blackbeard:Bleed.
relics.flavorText: They cause a lot of boo-boos.

relics.name: Penknife
relics.description: Every 8th Attack that uses at least one blackbeard:Weapon deals double damage.
relics.flavorText: If you have it in your pocket, don't forget to use it.

relics.name: Powder Can
relics.description: At the start of each combat, equip a 0 / 1 blackbeard:Weapon. When it is destroyed, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Just like a Powder Keg, but smaller.

relics.name: Magical Cauldron
relics.description: At the end of each combat, obtain a random potion.

relics.name: Poor Math Skills
relics.description: You think that you have gained 500 more Gold this run than you actually did. (It matters for cards that scale with Gold gained this run.)
relics.flavorText: Sometimes failing a math class is a good thing.

relics.name: Karategi
relics.description: Your blackbeard:Weapons have infinite Durability. After you attack with a blackbeard:Weapon, it goes to the last position.
relics.flavorText: When you wear it, you instantly learn new styles of combat.

relics.name: Load the Golden Cannons
relics.description: Replaces Load the Cannons. At the start of each combat, and then every 4 turns, add a Golden Cannonball into your hand.
relics.flavorText: Is it even worth to shoot all these golden cannonballs?!?

relics.name: Sober-minded
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, and then every 6 turns, lose 1 blackbeard:Resistance.
relics.flavorText: Being sober is not a natural state for The Blackbeard.

relics.name: Blood Orange
relics.description: Whenever you play 6 cards in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.
relics.flavorText: This citrus seems to have an interesting power.

relics.name: Crossed Swords
relics.description: Your attacks use an additional blackbeard:Weapon.

potions.name: Orange Juice
potions.description: Heal 8 HP. Remove all of your debuffs.

keywords.name: Bleed
keywords.description: Bleeding creatures lose HP at the start of their turn.

keywords.name: Reaper's Mark
keywords.description: Whenever 3 stacks are applied, they are removed and the creature loses HP equal to 40% of its missing HP.

keywords.name: Resistance
keywords.description: You take less damage from enemy attacks. (Enemy intents always show actual incoming damage, with Resistance taken into account.) Resistance can be negative.

keywords.name: Rusty Thorns
keywords.description: When attacked, deals damage back and reduces Rusty Thorns by 1.

keywords.name: Weapon
keywords.description: Whenever you play an attack card, one Durability of your rightmost Weapon is used and card's damage is increased by Weapon's Attack. You can equip a maximum of 10 Weapons.

mods.name: The Blackbeard
mods.credits: Jedi - Russian localization, 旅渚 - Simplified Chinese localization, Vex'd - various visual effects, Venim - card backgrounds
mods.description:
Adds The Blackbeard as a new playable character.

More info: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1612105245

GitHub: https://github.com/JohnnyBazooka89/StSModTheBlackbeard
